World","x":162,"y":544,"ins":[],"inNames":[],"outNames":[],"params":{"text":"Achilles and the Tortoise
-------------------------

As you may know, Achilles raced against a turtle who had a head start on Achilles. Achilles never managed to catch up with the turtle, since before he could do so he had to reach the place from which the turtle had set off. In the meantime, however, the turtle had moved ahead of Achilles to a new location. So Achilles had to reach this new place once again, but the tortoise was able to get a head start again and find himself in a new place...


Some believe that Achilles catches up with the tortoise after having been infinitely behind him... That he could accomplish an infinite task and then catch up.

In NoiseCraft, however, Achilles has no trouble catching up because time is not continuous, but discrete.

traduced from french with DeepL

(a or not b)"}}}}
